website_summaries.verdict: An affordable pain relieving cream that consumers love.
pros: Feels smooth to the skin, greasy to apply, and absorbs quickly
Works within 10 to 15 minutes after applying
Contains natural ingredients that are not only safe to use on cuts and abrasions, but also as an effective topical to clear troubled sinuses and congestion
cons: Leaves a very strong scent and delivers a slight burning sensation when applied

customer_reviews.title: Best OTC Relief Cream
customer_reviews.text: I have had 8 surgeries on one of my shoulders and my husband has had carpal and cubical tunnel surgeries. We are always looking for over the counter relief medicine that works. This is the best relief cream we have found, including prescription cream. We love the fact that it is a cream and not an ointment. It not only works better than anything we have found, it is a cream and not an ointment so it is not greasy at all and does not leave any type of stain and soaks right into the skin. The only thing we use now.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Pace

customer_reviews.title: Be careful when opening the jar, it’s not cream as I expected.
customer_reviews.text: Got this order perfectly as scheduled which is good. I ordered the cream. In my experience , cream is not liquid. So I opened it excitingly and it all spilt. Maybe this is a very liquid type of cream but liquid all the same. One container totally wasted. So be careful coz if this is how it is packed, then it shouldn’t be in a jar type but in a bottle type. I tried some spilt liquid in my tennis elbow. It’s cold and the smell is eucalyptus , I like but I do not know if it’s really effective yet. Just wrote this to warn the other to be careful in opening the jar.
customer_reviews.author: Nieves Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Arthritis Pain Relief
customer_reviews.text: I really love everything about th cream. It makes my knees feel warm and helps me rest. I apply it 2 o 3 times each day. Of all the creams including prescription creams this one is best for me. I do use it in conjunction with a prescription cream when the pain and soreness is really bad. In between this is my favorite. I love the smell and do use it for my sinuses as well. Nothing cures arthritis in your knees but this is such a relief. I recommend you try it. Just order one and see it works as well for you. I now buy it for friends to try because I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Sandlin

customer_reviews.title: It worked for me!
customer_reviews.text: I came across this product in a country store near Pigeon Forge, TN and bought it on a whim. I found that it brought quick relief to sore joints and muscles, and was happy to find it on Amazon. It’s noteworthy that it’s ingredients are not those typically found on pain relievers.
customer_reviews.author: Peter A. Goodell

customer_reviews.title: Effective temporary pain relief
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product in original and cream formulations, primarily the original. When applied the original is messy but will absorb and I generally put an old shirt on to protect bed linens. Many nights I have shoulder pain or sometimes knee pain that prevents sleep. Using this product I get almost instant relief and go to sleep. It will not cure anything but sure relieves pain. I have shared it with several others for back pain and other joint pain. Never had anyone say it did not provide temporary relief. I prefer this over drugs!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Chase

customer_reviews.title: This is the real deal
customer_reviews.text: I broke my neck and the lotion was a lifesaver. It gets the heat going right away and I would super highly recommend this to anyone who wants to upgrade from icy hot. This is the best deep heat cream I have ever used and I have tried lots.
customer_reviews.author: Dj magee

customer_reviews.title: Get the cream! It’s better than the ointment version!
customer_reviews.text: I’m an EMT and I hurt my back pretty bad a few days ago. My grandmother had the ointment version. I literally couldn’t stand without falling to my knees a few days ago. But after using this stuff daily along with daily soaks, my back is literally almost back to normal! I would HIGHLY recommend the cream because it absorbs through the skin better and is less greasy! Totally worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works & not a strong smell
customer_reviews.text: I have knee & shoulder pain. I have tried every rub, spray, etc for relief. Theg did not provide the extended relief I was looking for. The name Amish drew my attention to your product. It seems to work well, so much that I made a second order. So far so good. This product does not have a strong smell. I'm able to put it on, go out and not smell like liniment.
customer_reviews.author: Class-y

customer_reviews.title: Great Stuff
customer_reviews.text: I use this to ease the pain of sacroiliac joint pain so that I can go to sleep. It is great for minor pains as well and can be used to ease sinus congestion. I will order this again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only downside is it smells strong like Vicks.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mom, she suffers from fibermyalgia and this really helps her with her aches and pains. Long lasting. Only downside is it smells strong like Vicks... but maybe that doesn't bother you....
customer_reviews.author: Savannah May

customer_reviews.title: Get It for Needed Relief
customer_reviews.text: This stuff really works. I bought it to relieve my husband and my sore muscles because we work so hard. This gives the needed relief. I let my adopted grandma try it after I witnessed her fingers starting to curl from arthritis. She lathered this on and her fingers straightened back out. She now has her own supply.
customer_reviews.author: M. Swan

customer_reviews.title: This cream and ointment is AMAZING! Really relieves the pain and works within 15-20 ...
customer_reviews.text: This cream and ointment is AMAZING! Really relieves the pain and works within 15-20 mi utes
customer_reviews.author: S Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: Great cream for pain!
customer_reviews.text: My husband was given his first jar of Amish origins, and he tried it for back and hip pain. He has had back surgery, and sometimes pains return. He says it is great! It does have a scent, but it's not overwhelming. It feels cold when applied, and then warms up! It lasts for most of the day, which is really good. Try it instead of taking pills. It may be just what you need for those aches.
customer_reviews.author: Linda N. Warren

customer_reviews.title: Great pain relief
customer_reviews.text: This cream has a very strong smell, so if you don't like a strong menthol scent I would say don't get it. It works pretty quickly for pain relief. I have bad sciatica pain on my left upper thigh and a very sore left leg especially behind my knee. My range of motion is very limited in this leg. After i put the cream on my leg it feels a lot better and my range of motion increases dramatically. It's not a very thick cream. You only have to use a little of it because it's a thinner cream. I would highly recommend it. It worked great for me!
customer_reviews.author: paul chipko

customer_reviews.title: Great pain reducer
customer_reviews.text: I have Aurithtis in my right hand, your product relieves the pain. I also had pain in my neck when I moved my head, mostly from side to side for over a year. Even went to a Doctor which claimed I had the same thing that was happening to my hand in my neck. He sent me to a Physical Therapist, nothing worked. I found this product at a farmers market in the north eastern part of NC. During the first six months I felt a steady decline in the level of pain. My neck has been pain free for two years not. The Best Joseph Randazzo
customer_reviews.author: SUZANNE RANDAZZO

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is magic. Seriously. I sprained my middle toe so badly I thought it was broken. I couldn't walk on it, it was swollen and throbbed so much I couldn't sleep. The next morning I rubbed Amish Medicated on it, wrapped it to the toe next to it with a bandage. Later that day it was completely healed, I could walk run dance no pain no strain. I also use it for muscle pain, itchy rashes and it always works. It's the best.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Ringworm

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: helps my back a lot , cold feel so feels nice. takes care of my back pains from a long day work. was using this from a store about 35 mile away and loved it, now I can order it and have it in 2 days love it.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: So far this cream is working well.
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I are using this cream for foot pain. I rub it on my foot at night for plantar problems, and arthritis. My husband is on his feet all day and also has arthritis. This cream helps both of us.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Habegger

customer_reviews.title: Ezcellent!
customer_reviews.text: Order received promptly. Excellent cream, hot initially but settles to warm quickly. Greaseless and really works.
customer_reviews.author: SFWINO

customer_reviews.title: Works fast and well
customer_reviews.text: I found this lotion a while back in a little shop while on vacation. Little did I know that this would become my favorite pain relief cream. It gets in deep where the pain is. I would definitely recommend it to everyone who has pain. From just a slept wrong pain to an arthritis pain, I’ve used it for both and it really got in there deep.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Pain Free!!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say enough about this product I have been using a little bit of everything for months to try to ease my shoulder pain, but nothing has worked as good as this. It worked so well for me that I purchased some for my mother, grandmother, and mother-in-law for their arthritis pain as well.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Broadnax

customer_reviews.title: Pain Relief
customer_reviews.text: love this product,it is very much a great pain reliever highly recommend for anyone suffering from chronic pain or just an over tired back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Mom and she loves it. She uses it for arthritis pain, colds, and general muscle aches and pains. I tried it myself and it did help a sports injury I had. Much better smelling than the chemical pain creams.
customer_reviews.author: RWrigh

customer_reviews.title: Really works
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t have full motion of my finger and within minutes I had full motion!

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this produce. You get instant pain relief!
customer_reviews.text: I would definitely recommend this product. The cream works better than bio freeze. The cool burn sensation is immediate and lasts much longer, thus giving better relief from aches and pains.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product. I have a terrible knee problem. This has been the only thing that gives me some relief. I don’t have to worry about my skin peeling because of burn of the medication. Give it a try you won’t be disappointed.

customer_reviews.title: Works good on arthritis

customer_reviews.title: Pain Reliever
customer_reviews.text: My husband has severe leg and shoulder pain. It was suggested that I purchase some Amish Deep Penetrating Cream to rub on his legs and shoulders, to our surprise the pain was gone in a few minutes. We place an order for Amish Deep Penetrating Cream before it runs out. We are so satisfied with the product that we recommended it to a family member.

customer_reviews.title: It’s cool soothing reaction that causes a great relief to my pain problems

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!

customer_reviews.title: Helps some with my neuropathy pain
customer_reviews.text: I have very bad neuropathy after having a liver transplant. It is very painful just to walk and I do take medication for the pain. However, the medication puts my pain level down to a 6 from a 10, if I am not walking too much. This cream helps bring my pain level down about another 1 point for a few hours. I will take any help for my pain and this does help me some. It does not take my pain away, but at this point I do not think anything will. The only problem is the amount you get, it would be nicer if the jar contained a few more ounces.

product_meta.title: Amish Origins Deep Penetrating Pain Relief Cream (Greaseless) 3.5 oz (PACK OF 2)- Medicated Pain Relief Cream, Quick Acting Pain Relief Formula, Perfect for Aching Joints, Arthritis, Restless Legs, Sore Muscles
feature_bullets: PROVIDES FAST RELIEF FROM PAIN: Carefully formulated with active ingredients that target pains, Amish Origins Deep Penetrating Pain Relief Cream is formulated to provide long-lasting relief from pains associated with Arthritis, aching joints, sore muscles, restless legs, bruises, sprains, backache and more.

QUICK-ACTING PAIN RELIEF FORMULA: Amish Origin medicated pain relief cream has earned its reputation as one of the best on the market, and that’s because it delivers on its promises. As a powerful pain relief cream, Amish Origins pain relief cream absorbs quickly and delivers fast relief from pain.

QUICK-ACTING PAIN RELIEF FORMULA: Amish Origin medicated pain relief cream has earned its reputation as one of the best on the market, and that’s because it delivers on its promises. As a powerful pain relief cream, Amish Origins pain relief cream absorbs quickly and delivers fast relief from pain.
EASY TO USE: This pain relief cream is easy to use. Simply apply a little amount topically, wherever you feel pain, and watch the magic unfolds.
